io.sarl.core

Interface Behaviors

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Capacity

    public interface Behaviors
extends Capacity
    Agent behaviors management.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventListener asEventListener()
      Replies the interface to dispatch an event to agent's Behaviors
      Behavior registerBehavior(Behavior attitude)
      Register a Behavior for the owner agent.
      Behavior unregisterBehavior(Behavior attitude)
      Unregisters a behavior for the owner agent
      void wake(Event evt)
      Wake the agent's behaviors reacting to the Event evt.

    • Method Detail

      • registerBehavior

        Behavior registerBehavior(Behavior attitude)
        Register a Behavior for the owner agent. The new Behavior will react to all declared events received by the agent.

      • unregisterBehavior

        Behavior unregisterBehavior(Behavior attitude)
        Unregisters a behavior for the owner agent

      • wake

        void wake(Event evt)
        Wake the agent's behaviors reacting to the Event evt.

      • asEventListener

        EventListener asEventListener()
        Replies the interface to dispatch an event to agent's Behaviors
